word_mean_info__list.difference: 指领悟，通过生动的构思或想象从而抓住事物的本质。
与imagine略不同，往往指的是不切实际的，属于梦幻般的想象。
最普通用词，指想或思索，也指由反复思考而作出判断或得出结论等。
比conceive更强调形象思维，指在头脑中形成一个清晰明确的意象。
指在头脑中组织好自己的思想，在心中形成一个系统的思想或一个见解。

word_group.brief_definition: 实现价值；可变现的价值

bilingual.source: But now, I realize that I was just being silly.
bilingual.target: 但现在，我意识到我只是太傻了。

bilingual.source: This made me realize that there's no egg in eggplant either.
bilingual.target: 这让我意识到茄子里也没有鸡蛋。

bilingual.source: She came to realize how much she actually missed all of them.
bilingual.target: 她意识到自己其实非常想念他们。
她意识到自己犯了一个错误。

bilingual.source: I realize I forgot to bring my keys.
bilingual.target: 我意识到我忘记带钥匙了。
他们意识到合作的重要性。

bilingual.source: I realize the importance of staying healthy.
bilingual.target: 我意识到保持健康的重要性。

bilingual.source: She didn't realize her words were so hurtful.
bilingual.target: 她没有意识到她的话是如此伤人的。

bilingual.source: Looking back, I realize I made many mistakes.
bilingual.target: 回头看，我意识到我犯了很多错误。

bilingual.source: He finally realize his dream of becoming a doctor.
bilingual.target: 他终于意识到了成为医生的梦想。

list.abstract: 《realize》是玉置成实演唱的一首日语流行歌曲，由BOUNCEBACK作词作曲，收录在2003年7月24日发行的专辑《Realize》中。
《realize》是日剧《龙樱》主题曲，演唱歌手melody。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you realize how you sound?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你意识到你在说什么吗？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't realize how much I lean on you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我之前没意识到我多么倚重你。

yingyinNormal.en: I never realize how many people hold hands in malls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我从没意识到商场里有多少人牵着手。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't realize I was in an all-male club until that minute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我直到这时才意识到自己来到了一家全男性俱乐部。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, do you realize the shit storm that's about to hit us?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是说，你意识到山雨欲来了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But I realize now that keeping something to myself is selfish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我意识到独自占有某样东西是自私的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Do you realize we almost made it 10 years without that coming up?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有没有意识到，这都十年前的骨灰了你还往出挖？

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, I sees that! I did not realize! We will resume the finding of Mimom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是，我发现了！我之前都没意识到！我们会重新找迈玛的。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you can stay massacred or you can realize the battle has just begun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，你可以坐等屠杀降临，也可以意识到战争刚刚开始。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I didn't realize how easy we have it now that Lily's so independent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，我之前都没意识到现在莉莉这么大了，我们过得有多舒坦。

yingyinNormal.en: Your relatives didn't realize they would have been better off being friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的曾祖母没有意识到她们本来可以成为好朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you do when you realize you're not the smartest kid in school anymore?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你意识到自己不是学校里最聪明的孩子时你会怎么做？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, do you realize that, at one time or another, we all lived in this apartment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，你们有没有意识到，我们每个人都在这里住过。

yingyinNormal.en: Because none of us would be here without our degree, you do realize that, don't you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为没有学位我们任何一个都不会在这，你有意识到这点，对吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't realize all of a sudden you're the most honest guy on the planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真抱歉，我现在才意识到你是全世界最诚实的人了。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Did not realize you were 70. That's, that question just doesn't work for you, does it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯...等等，我真没意识到你已经70了。所以那个问题不适合你对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: This is fucking insane! You realize that? These people are crooks and they should be in prison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他妈真是疯了！你意识到了吗？这些人都是骗子，他们都该进监狱。

yingyinNormal.en: Today made me realize something, Mitchell. No, I don't want to be a 4:17 kind of person. Do you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 米奇尔，今天的事情让我意识到我不想当那种按分钟规划时间的人，你呢？

yingyinNormal.en: You may not realize it, but you're very important. Unfortunately, your trials have only just begun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还没意识到你是非常重要的。很不幸，你的测试才刚刚开始。

yingyinNormal.en: You're right. I didn't realize I was making you feel that way. It was very brave of you to tell me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你说得对，我没意识到我让你难过了，你能这样告诉我，真是太勇敢了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But phones run on batteries, and batteries can die faster than we <highlight>realize</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是手机依靠电池运行，而电池耗尽的速度要比我们意识到的要快。

examination_example.sentence: Half of them found a toy; the other half discovered the container was empty — and <highlight>realized</highlight> the tester had fooled them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中有一半的人找到了玩具；另一半的人发现容器是空的——并意识到测试员愚弄了他们。

examination_example.sentence: However, during that course I <highlight>realized</highlight> I was not good enough in this area to compete with other creative personalities in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在那个课程中，我意识到我在这个领域还不够好，不足以在未来与其他有创造力的人竞争。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Realize</highlight> the national dream
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实现国家梦

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>realize</highlight> work can be fully functional and entirely fulfilling without needing to be best mates with the people sitting next to you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现，即便没能和坐在你旁边的同事成为最佳搭档也一样可以把工作做到位。

examination_example.sentence: It wasn't until I entered the corporate world that I <highlight>realized</highlight> being friends with colleagues didn't emerge as a priority at all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到我步入了职场我才意识到，和同事做朋友根本算不上是什么头等大事。

examination_example.sentence: Some businesses have begun to <highlight>realize</highlight> it may not be effective to let consumers take full responsibility for recycling.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些企业已经意识到把回收利用以减少浪费的希望全都寄托在消费者身上并非有效之举。

examination_example.sentence: Some companies are <highlight>realizing</highlight> that placing the burden of recycling entirely on the consumer is not an effective strategy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些企业意识到，把回收利用以减少浪费的负担全推给消费者并非有效之举。

examination_example.sentence: Emphasize your team and how through their talents, your vision was <highlight>realized</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 强调你的团队，以及如何通过他们的才华实现你的构想。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: He was heartbroken after <highlight>realizing</highlight> he'd missed his high school graduation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在意识到自己错过了高中毕业典礼后，他感到心碎。

examination_example.sentence: "We <highlight>realize</highlight> that as a company with people, trucks, warehouses, we needed to play a larger role," said Eduardo Martinez, the president of the UPS Foundation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联合包裹基金会主席爱德华多马丁内斯说：“我们意识到，作为一家拥有人员、卡车、仓库的公司，我们需要发挥更大的作用。”

examination_example.sentence: "We <highlight>realized</highlight> in the mid-1970s that it was missing, " says Effie Kapsalis, head of the Smithsonian Institution Archives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 史密森学会档案馆负责人 Effie Kapsalis 说：“20世纪70年代中期我们就发现它丢失了。”

examination_example.sentence: If we spend a hundred yuan in cash, we <highlight>realize</highlight> that we don't have that hundred yuan to spend on something else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们花100元现金，我们会意识到我们没有那100元钱去买别的东西。

examination_example.sentence: The hope of achieving a thriving life is impossible to <highlight>realize</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实现繁荣生活的希望是不可能实现的。

word_usage.usage:
realize跟名词、代词或从句：
The students don't realize the use we make of the information.
学生们认识不到我们对信息的利用。
Mary realized she was being made fun of.
玛丽认识到她正在被人愚弄。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Getting a little closer, I <highlight>realized</highlight> one kayak (皮筏艇) was in trouble.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走近一点，我意识到有一条皮划艇遇到了麻烦。

examination_example.sentence: I soon <highlight>realized</highlight> that the silence was not unpleasant.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很快意识到这种沉默并没有令人不快。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>realized</highlight> this a day later, when I saw newspaper advertisements for the set at seventy-five dollars less than I had paid.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天后，当我看到报纸上的广告说这套电视比我支付的价格低75美元时，我意识到了这一点。

word_usage.usage:
realize跟名词、代词或从句：
The students don't realize the use we make of the information.
学生们认识不到我们对信息的利用。
Mary realized she was being made fun of.
玛丽认识到她正在被人愚弄。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: People failed to <highlight>realize</highlight> the danger of the virus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们没有意识到这种病毒的危险性。

examination_example.sentence: He began to <highlight>realize</highlight> how his parents felt every time at the dinner table ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他开始意识到父母每次在餐桌上的感受。

examination_example.sentence: I came to <highlight>realize</highlight> that the food is so closely connected with its local culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我开始意识到食物与当地文化有着密切的联系。

examination_example.sentence: In the end, Tim <highlight>realized</highlight> his dream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，蒂姆实现了他的梦想。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Realizing</highlight> Chinese dream is now getting closer to us than any time in the history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们现在比历史上任何时期都更接近实现中国梦。

examination_example.sentence: Never give up your dream. It may be <highlight>realized</highlight> in another new way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 永远不要放弃你的梦想，它可能会以另一种新的方式实现。
